name: Skyward Atlas

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 160% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 15%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 18%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 240% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 21%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 280% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 24%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 320% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

description: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and its former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.
